title: ICAO airport code

description.part1: To get started, edit <1>src/App.js</1> and save to reload.
description.part2: Switch language between english and russian using buttons above.

airportList: You can choose from the list

contactPage.text: Feel free to ask any questions or suggestions

copyRadar: You have to copy the link and have to open in a new window in order to view this airport on  FlightRadar24
error: Sorry, something went wrong. Try again later or contact administrators

aiportPage.ATC: *You must always listen to ATC for the active runway. The following  runway suggestions are just approximations by wind direction.
aiportPage.listenATC: Listen to ATC for the active runway, or choose by yourself
aiportPage.Heading: Heading
aiportPage.RunwaysPosition: *Runways dimensions and positions are not strictly accurate
aiportPage.Google: *Click to GoogleMap to open the map in a new window
